show.subtitle: Connect the Dots promotes health activism, linking personal health to the health of our culture, society, and environment.
show.title: Connect The Dots

title: Connect The Dots
content:
Josh Fox and Vera Scroggins: Fractivist Pioneers:  Listen to Josh Fox,  the director of the Oscar-nominated film... <!--more--> Gaslands, (and Gaslands II) on his new Solutions Tour.
Josh discusses the fracking ban and his work on stopping climate change.
 Special guest is Vera Scroggins, the citizen journalist and activist on her work in Susquehanna County, PA, the site of environmental contamination from fracking — this Wednesday at 10 AM ET in conversation with Alison Rose Levy
